attributes.action: Ban smoking at G20 summit for world readers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is good enough for us the British Public should be good enough for them the powers that be, after all it was these dictators who brought the smoking ban in even in private members clubs.  They make it up to suit them as they go along! We know smoking isn't good but what happened to freedom of choice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
